name: Black Screen Simulator
description:
Black Screen Simulator is one of the latest and most advanced simulator games to ever hit the market. Black Screen Simulator stands out in the way that it is the only game ever where you stare at a black screen. It's truly something special!

Download this game now and become part of the new Black Screen Simulator craze!

This game was made in 10 minutes by a Grade 11 student, and it is his most visually stunning game to date! It's easy to see why!
